# Darkskull
## Overview
**Aura** moderate evocation \[evil]; **CL** 9th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 60,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This skull, carved from ebony, is wholly evil. Wherever the skull goes, the area around it is treated as though an *[[Unhallow (Spell)|unhallow]]* spell had been cast with the skull as the touched point of origin. Each *darkskull* has a single spell effect tied to it. This spell is from the standard list given in the *[[Unhallow (Spell)|unhallow]]* spell description, and it cannot be changed.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Unhallow (Spell)|unhallow]]* 

**Cost** 30,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 508
